item.title: Thanh Ha
item.description: Thanh Ha is a DevOps Engineer at the Lumina Networks. Since 2014 he has participated in the OpenDaylight project providing release engineering expertise to the project. His area of focus is in build automation and tooling to support OpenDaylight’s Continuous Integration (CI) platform.
